recipesJson.name: Dragon Milk
recipesJson.author: Zany
recipesJson.description:
---
---
-  Strawberries & Cream 

___
---
*Ever wanted to know what it's like to be breastfed by a dragon? Now you can!*

___

Derived from [ID10-T](https://alltheflavors.com/users/ID10-T)'s [Mother of God's Milk](https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/32469)

I enjoyed the original recipe, but wanted to try adding some more creaminess - while still being able to taste the original recipe underneath it all.

Can be vaped off the shake, but the creams do come out more and start to settle after 7 days.

---
I use 70/30 - VG/PG at 3mg

 / Please feel free to leave feedback
